SpanishEmanuel Ghebreyesus
Strategic Account Executive (UK Government, Nuclear & CNI) at
Tripwire
Maidenhead, Berkshire, United Kingdom
Summary
A seasoned, security focused professional with a proven track
record and customer centric drive to a challenging, complex project
management that focuses on customers/prospects overall goal and
ability to bring together internal and partners resources to deliver a
successful and fruitful end result to meet the ultimate goals of my
customers and prospects. 
My focus at Tripwire is to deliver the message of the necessity,
benefits and best practice of continuous monitoring of change
configuration, compliance, critical file integrity, vulnerability, log and
event management.
I take pride in engaging on every large or small project with the same
conviction no matter of the size or complication of the project as I
believe every project deserves the same attention. 
I work effectively with large SI's, VAR's and consulting organisation
to make sure every project or task is completed to the best and
fruitful outcomes where my customers/prospects are satisfied.
It has always been my goal to over achieve on my customers
expectations in any given task/project I have ever undertaken and
I am proud to be a trusted advisor of many Government and CNI
organisation. 
I am proud to say I have achieved a good name, status of a trusted
advisor, throughout my employment history as well as the companies
that I have created and continue to run. 
I continuously excel expectations and lead by example to a point of
being a high valued asset.
Experience
Tripwire
Strategic Account Executive (UK Government, Nuclear, CNI, NHS &
Non-For-Profit)
November 2015 - Present  (4 years 9 months)
Maidenhead
  Page 1 of 4
   
Helping customers reduce their networks attack surface by hardening system
security configurations whilst continuously tracking risk factors such as config
changes, vulnerabilities and security events to decrease their breach to
detection window.
Intel Security Group (McAfee)
Enterprise Account Manager
November 2012 - November 2015  (3 years 1 month)
Central, Local Government and Police.
Security strategy for government has shifted from component-based protection
to cyber resilience. This shift replaces device protection with service integrity,
weak foundations with trusted infrastructure, monolithic dependencies with
agility, and continuous expenditure with significant cost reductions. As a critical
supplier to government, Intel Security (McAfee) enables this transformation by
delivering a strategy, capability, and platform that enable resilient and secure
systems.
Bellviso Global
DIRECTOR/OWNER
May 2009 - November 2012  (3 years 7 months)
Bellviso is a global company providing the highest quality training in Airbrush
make-up, Traditional Make-up and Airbrush tanning. Our Master Classes will
give make-up artists and would-be professionals, the skills and confidence to
incorporate airbrushing in to their artistic repertoire.
Training programs are delivered by highly experienced professionals, using
the best equipment, tools and products available. We are confident that the
training we provide will produce skilled professionals, capable of working at the
highest levels in the make- up industry. Our courses will give you the skills you
need to enter into the media, professional photography, theatre, movies world
and also the skills to set up your own freelance business. In addition, talented
students who show creative flair will be added to our portfolio of professionals
whose services can be booked online.
Bellviso’s, second to none services, which include make up, hair and wardrobe
styling for fashion, photography, TV/video shoots, stage shows and bridal
bookings are provided by top of the industry professionals.
Cactus Consulting
Owner/Director
October 2002 - November 2012  (10 years 2 months)
  Page 2 of 4
   
Starting out with a share of a franchise and then continuing to purchase a
full 50% share of the company, my duties in Cactus have been varied. This
has included setting up marketing strategies to meet seasonal trends of the
business, leading staff by example to provide a complete service to clients that
is unmatched on the Island, negotiating with purchasers and property owners.
Organising and setting up mortgages for clients, organizing and applying for
legal documentations required to purchase a property on the island, power of
attorneys, reforms & construction of properties as well as controlling the
accounts of the company.
McAfee
Account Manager
February 1999 - September 2002  (3 years 8 months)
Account manager for small to medium accounts ranging from 150 to 2000
users on a network as well as assisting and managing businesses with more
users. Going on to manage a team that was created to displce competitors
products and managing South Africa and the Benelux countries.
The Cable Corporation Ltd & Telewest Communications
Market Development Co-ordinator
December 1996 - June 1998  (1 year 7 months)
First customer contact for company, dealing with territory management
developing new areas of business by door-to-door selling, achieving targets,
customer care, sales support, generating and following up sales leads,
company and product presentation and closing sales. Key role- identifying and
matching customer needs to the correct product package.
Helens International PLC
Head Office Manager
August 1991 - September 1995  (4 years 2 months)
As branch Manager I was the main commission agent for the government
of Eritrea as well as this my duties included market research, strategic
planning, sales, forecasting, stock control, auditing. Liaising with national
and international banks to organize letters of credit. Dealing and negotiating
with major international companies, governments and non-government
organizations such as UNDP, DANIDA, RED CROSS, WFP and ERRA.
Communicating at senior management, director level and negotiating contract
worth over $4,500,000.
  Page 3 of 4
   
Education
Reading College
A Level and Diploma, Pure&Applied Maths, Physics and
Chemistry  · (1987 - 1990)
Crookham Court School
Olevel   · (1983 - 1987)
  Page 4 of 4
